name: Call of Duty: Black Ops with First Strike
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops with First Strike
description:
Call of Duty®: Black Ops™ takes you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. With access to exclusive weaponry and equipment, your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known. First Strike contains 5 incredibly diverse maps spanning the globe, featuring 4 multiplayer maps and a new Zombie experience.
Dolby and the double-D symbol are trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.
